vrooli-team.description: Team-shared Vrooli MCP server for collaborative development

_documentation.description: Project-shared MCP configuration for team collaboration
usage: This configuration is shared with the development team
Ideal for team-based workflows and collaboration
Each team member should set their own VROOLI_API_KEY
The URL should point to a shared Vrooli instance if using remote server
team_setup: 1. Ensure all team members have access to the Vrooli server
2. Each member should generate their own API key
3. Set VROOLI_API_KEY in each member's environment
4. Consider using a shared Vrooli instance for team projects

environment_variables.VROOLI_API_KEY: Each team member's individual Vrooli API key

team_workflows.swarm_coordination: Coordinate AI swarm activities across team
